short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alerts users when air quality index exceeds unsafe levels

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AQI-Alert is your go-to Chrome extension for real-time air quality updates and alerts. With a single click, know the Air Quality Index (AQI) of your current location, receive instant alerts for hazardous air conditions, and access actionable tips to stay safe.

üåü Key Features:

    Real-time AQI monitoring based on your location.
    Alerts for unhealthy or hazardous air quality levels.
    Detailed AQI descriptions (e.g., "Good," "Moderate," "Unhealthy") for better understanding.
    Health tips for various AQI levels to minimize exposure.
    Lightweight and user-friendly design.

üõ°Ô∏è Why AQI-Alert?
Whether you‚Äôre commuting, exercising outdoors, or planning your day, AQI-Alert helps you make informed decisions to protect your health and that of your loved ones.

üí° How to Use:

    Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
    Click the AQI-Alert icon in your browser toolbar.
    Allow location access to fetch AQI data for your area.
    View the AQI level instantly!

Stay safe. Stay informed. Download AQI-Alert today!
